Avatar by @DearMsDear

content:
I had to watch some video for the take-home exam. It was about racism, very heavy. It more or less took all my spoons.

But now I'm going to read the related chapters in the book about it. It's more about group psychology.

If anyone's interested look up the blue eye/brown eye experiment
